Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 10: Your What Needs a Why
Description:
This is the 10th chapter from Michael's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the couple of weeks, we'll be releasing a few chapters a week so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).

In this chapter, Michael Hyatt discusses the power of motivation in achieving our goals. He highlights the temptation to quit and the importance of perseverance. He also emphasizes the significance of intrinsic motivations and provides strategies for staying motivated including "finding your why".

Want the rest of the book now? Make sure to visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com.
